Package edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader.gradebook

package edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader.gradebook
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader
    This package contains classes that are used to keep track of students, grade projects, and submit assignments for The Joy of Coding.
    edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader.gradebook.ui
     
    edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader.canvas

  • Class
    Description
    Assignment
    This class represents an assignment give to students in The Joy of Coding.
    Assignment.AssignmentType
     
    Assignment.ProjectType
     
    Grade
    This class represent the grade a student got on an assignment.
    Grade.SubmissionInfo
     
    GradeBook
    This class represents a grade book that contains information about an offering of the course: the assignments, the students and their grades.
    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges
     
    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges.LetterGradeRange
     
    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges.LetterGradeRange.InvalidLetterGradeRange
     
    LetterGrade
     
    Notable
    Classes that implement this interface have notes associated with them.
    NotableImpl
    The abstract superclass of several notable classes.
    Student
    This class represents a student who is taking the course.
    Student.Section
     
    XmlDumper
    This class dumps the contents of a GradeBook to an XML file.
    XmlGradeBookParser
    This class creates a GradeBook from the contents of an XML file.
    XmlHelper
    This class contains fields and methods that are useful when dealing with XML data.
    XmlStudentParser
    This class parses XML data that describes a Student.
